title: Add tabs to live output panel (Output + Context)
description:
Modify run-output-pane.ts to add tab navigation between streaming output and context document.

Implementation:
- Add sl-tab-group with two tabs: 'Output' and 'Context'
- Output tab: existing streaming output functionality (run-output-pane content)
- Context tab: embed context-pane component showing epic context
- Remember selected tab preference (localStorage)
- Pass current epic ID to context-pane for fetching

Tab behavior:
- Default to Output tab when run starts
- Context tab available when epic has context document
- Tabs persist across runs within same session

Run: npm test -- --grep 'run-output-pane'
acceptance_criteria: Output panel has tabs switching between streaming output and context document
closed_reason: Fixed verification failure by committing static assets (app-DzPzCnIu.js) that were built but not committed in iteration 6. The run-output-pane tabs feature was already complete.
